Description: Rim and body sherd (mended from numerous fragments) of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; exterior: dot and billet pattern band at rim above hook maeander pattern band between pairs of dilute bands; below, lion (front paws and face lost) to right; swastikas, dotted crosses and dotted rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0566) (phase 2)
